messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'handleCommand'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [handleCommand]

messages.message: Error: Cannot create components during render Components created during render will reset their state each time they are created. Declare components outside of render. D:\WebApps\cyber-portfolio\src\components\SkillBadge.tsx:66:14 64 | )} 65 | > > 66 | | ^^^^ This component is created during render 67 | {name} 68 | {level && ( 69 | D:\WebApps\cyber-portfolio\src\components\SkillBadge.tsx:56:32 54 | 55 | export function SkillBadge({ name, level, className, icon: ManualIcon }: SkillBadgeProps) { > 56 | const Icon = ManualIcon || getIcon(name); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ The component is created during render here 57 | 58 | return ( 59 |

'use client'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Briefcase, GraduationCap, Award, Server, Shield, Globe, Terminal as TerminalIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import { Terminal, TerminalLine } from '@/components/Terminal'; import { SkillBadge } from '@/components/SkillBadge'; export function AboutContent() { const skills = { "Security & Governance": ["Risk Assessment", "Data Classification", "Data Exposure Analysis", "Compliance"], "Security Tools": ["Burp Suite", "OWASP ZAP", "Nmap", "Wireshark", "Metasploit"], "Domains": ["Web App Security", "Threat Detection", "Linux Hardening", "Network Security"], "Scripting & Auto": ["Python", "Bash", "Git", "GitHub Actions"], }; return (
{/* Header */}

About Me

I am a final-year Computer Science student focused on building secure, scalable software systems. My work combines full-stack development (React, Node.js, databases, cloud) with cybersecurity practices such as application security testing, Linux hardening, and secure authentication.

I approach security as part of the software engineering lifecycle ΓÇö not as a separate role.

{/* How I Approach Security - Engineering Maturity */}

How I Approach Security

Threat Modeling First

Before scanning, I analyze the architecture to understand critical assets and potential attack vectors.

Validation & Proof

I don't just report scanner outputs. I validate findings with reproducible steps (PoCs) to eliminate false positives.

Remediation Focused

Finding bugs is half the job. I provide engineers with clear, actionable context to fix issues at the root.

{/* Experience Section */}

Experience

Freelance Web Architect & Technical Lead

Feb 2020 - Present
ProgVision ΓÇó Worldwide / Remote
  • Started as a freelance designer and evolved into a full-cycle web architect.
  • Delivered 10+ high-performance, secure websites for global clients across various industries.
  • Mastered the complete lifecycle: from initial design to secure production deployment and scaling.
  • Integrated security-first principles into every freelance build from the ground up.

Linux System Administration Trainee

Jun 2024 - Jul 2024
Red Hat ΓÇó Remote
  • Hardened systems through SSH security, privilege management, and firewall rule enforcement.
  • Performed system security assessments using audit tools and manual validation techniques.
  • Supported remediation efforts by applying configuration fixes and validating post-change security posture.
{/* Skills Section */}

Technical Arsenal

{Object.entries(skills).map(([category, items]) => (

{category}

{items.map(skill => ( ))}
))}
{/* Education & Certs */}

Education

B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

(Cyber Security)
Lovely Professional University
2022 - 2026
CGPA: 7.35 (Till 6th Semester)

Intermediate (MPC)

Narayana Junior College
2020 - 2022

  • QuickHeal Certified Malware Analyst

  • CompTIA PenTest+

    CompTIA
    Aug 2025

Security & Engineering Journey
